name: i-ALERT 2 Condition Monitor
description: The i-ALERT2 condition monitoring app is optimized for  Samsung Galaxy S5, S6, S7, S8  LG Google Nexus 5x, 6, 6p  Motorola Droid Turbo, MOTO X, MOTO G  Mobile app requires Android 5.0 and Bluetooth 4.0.  The i-ALERT2 condition monitor is a health monitoring platform for rotating equipment. It offers users intuitive interface to view equipment operational data and machine records to help detect machine failures earlier.  The i-ALERT2 App interfaces with a separate i-ALERT2 condition monitor that must be purchased.  Early Detection of Machine Failures:  Vibration, Temperature, Run-time Monitoring  Data Logging with Trend Analysis  Advanced Vibration Analysis Tools (FFT and Time Waveform)  Manage Equipment:  Track devices on a data route  Generate Detailed Reports on Equipment  Edit and Set Alarm Thresholds  Examine Historical Trend data  Instant Access to Machine Records:  Product Details  Hydraulic Information  Construction Data  Bill of Materials (BOM) / Parts List  Sales Service Locator:  Find the local ITT or Authorized Sales or Service Center near you
